definition: Henan province (Honan) in central China, abbr. 豫[Yu4], capital Zhengzhou 鄭州|郑州[Zheng4 zhou1]
river/CL:條|条[tiao2],道[dao4]
south
surname Nan
to save/to economize/to do without/to omit/to leave out/province/(archaic) central government department
to inspect/to examine/to be aware/to pay a visit (to one's parents or elders)

sentences.english: Donation of 550 wheelchairs at Qinyang, Henan on May 22, 2008.
sentences.chinese: 天邻基金会捐赠550张轮椅河南省沁阳市残疾人士。

sentences.english: The development history, teacher and student resources, reform of the education contents and methods, funds and school-house building of the primary education of Henan province were investigated.
sentences.chinese: 第一部分，主要考察河南省小学教育的发展历程。

sentences.english: In 771 B. C, the capital was moved eastward to Luoyang in present-day Henan Province.
sentences.chinese: 公元前771年，周的首都东迁到了现河南省的洛阳。

sentences.english: Professionalizing social work is needed to build harmonic community in Henan.
sentences.chinese: 河南省社会工作职业化是构建和谐河南的需要。

sentences.english: The latest round of storms also battered Zhengzhou, capital of Henan Province.
sentences.chinese: 最新一轮的暴风雨还袭击了河南省会郑州。

sentences.english: 'The situation has been very critical, ' said Mr. Li, 'especially in Henan province.
sentences.chinese: 李方平说，形势非常危急，尤其是在河南省。

sentences.english: It is especially true for Puyang County in Henan Province.
sentences.chinese: 河南省濮阳县就属于其中的一例。

sentences.english: The paper introduced the renovation plan of dangerous bridges along the local narrow track railway in Henan Province.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了河南省窄轨地方铁路危桥整治方案。

sentences.english: We have arranged a meeting for the company with the Vice Governor.
sentences.chinese: 我们还为这家公司约见了河南省副省长。

sentences.english: Shaolin Temple is located in Dengfeng Henan province.
sentences.chinese: 少林寺位于河南省登封市。

sentences.english: In Anhui and Henan provinces, some power plants shut down.
sentences.chinese: 安徽与河南省的一些发电厂已经关闭。

sentences.english: In 1921 the first time in Sanmenxia City, Henan Mianchi Xian Yangshao Village found.
sentences.chinese: 1921年首次在河南省三门峡市渑池县仰韶村发现。

sentences.english: Xiaolangdi Hydropower Station is an ideal black startup power station in Henan Power Grid.
sentences.chinese: 小浪底水电厂是河南省网理想的黑启动电厂。

sentences.english: In northern Henan Province Prison 25 occurred in the early morning escape together.
sentences.chinese: 河南省豫北监狱25日凌晨发生一起越狱事件。

sentences.english: Huainan partridge duck is excellently autochthonous breed in Henan Province.
sentences.chinese: 淮南麻鸭是河南省优良地方家禽品种。

sentences.english: The company's" silver" brand registered trademark in Henan province was named after the famous trademark.
sentences.chinese: 公司的“银城”牌注册商标被河南省命名为著名商标。
